Key Match Events: England and Switzerland drew 1-1 in the Euro 2024 quarter-final, with Bukayo Saka and Harry Kane scoring for England, and Breel Embolo equalizing for Switzerland.
Pre-Game Insights: England left-back Luke Shaw is expected to be passed fit for Saturday's Euro 2024 quarter-final against Switzerland.
Gareth Southgate may be tempted to take a risk and start Shaw in the quarter-final, using him as a left wing-back in a back three formation.
Post-Match Reflections: England won the match 5-3 on penalties after the game ended 1-1 in extra time.
Miscellaneous Highlights: England boss Gareth Southgate discussed the 'problems' England face ahead of the quarter-final tie against Switzerland.
Gary Neville believes Luke Shaw will start for England against Switzerland, saying'my gut feeling is yes'.
